CustomField.formula: IF ( YEAR(Next_Annual_Review_Date__c) > YEAR(TODAY()), "1.Done", IF ( YEAR(Next_Annual_Review_Date__c) < YEAR (TODAY()), "2.Overdue", IF ( Next_Annual_Review_Date__c < TODAY(), "2.Overdue", IF ( Next_Annual_Review_Date__c >= TODAY(), "3.Schedule", "" ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Annual Review Status
